Description: Rim sherd of Ionian pottery deep plate; white slip; flat rim; paired hook maeander pattern on rim between brown bands; brown band below rim; added red bands; exterior: glazed edge underside of rim; trace of red band on bowl and possibly white band below.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by University College London. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Burnt in the bombing in 1941. Joins UCL 188a.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.970)
